description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Thai-style Beef Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Thaistyle Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful fresh coriander, leaves only, plus extra to garnish
1 fresh hot red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
12 tbs Thai fish sauce, such as nam pla

recipeInstructions.text: Put the leftover beef, carrots, onion, bamboo shoots, fresh mint leaves, fresh basil leaves, and coriander in a large bowl, and toss together gently. Season with salt and black pepper.

In a small bowl or jug, whisk together the lime juice, sugar, chilli, and fish sauce. Taste, and adjust the seasoning if needed. Pour the dressing over the salad, then garnish with the extra coriander leaves. Serve immediately.
